item.description:
**NOTE THE FINAL STOPS BELOW!!!! The Southie bar crawl is here! We look forward to seeing you all. To take the T/Redline, get off at Broadway T stop and walk up West Broadway to Shenannigans @ 332 West Broadway. The crawl ends at The Stadium which is a short walk to the Andrew Square T stop on the Redline.

1:00 Shenannigans 332 W Broadway 269-9509

2:00 Blackthorn Pub 471 W Broadway 269-5510

3:30 Boston Beer Garden 734 E Broadway 269-0990

4:30 Playwright 658 E Broadway 269-2537

5:30 Stats Bar & Grille, 77 Dorchester Street 268-9300
(they will be ready for food orders here)

7:00 Junction 110 Dorchester Street 268-6429

8:00 Stadium Sports Bar & Grill 232 Old Colony Avenue 617 269 5100
(they will be ready for food orders here)
item.name: Wedeln Pub Crawl in Southie!!!
